P. Prabhukumar"', 'Acharya_Institute_of_Technology | affiliation | Visvesvaraya_Technological_University', 'Acharya_Institute_of_Technology | country | "India"']

final_response: Acharya Institute of Technology is located in Soldevanahalli, on Acharya Dr. Sarvapalli Radhakrishnan Road, Hessarghatta Main Road, Bangalore – 560090, in India. The institute is affiliated with Visvesvaraya Technological University and is led by its director, Dr. G. P. Prabhukumar.
